desc: A store for everyone with style. Everyone loves to shop but it’s for them to know which store gives them what they’re shopping for regarding fashion and style. At Lucre we combine our best urban styles and execute the vision. There’s always a fit for someone to wear it’s just up to them to find it.

layout.text: The new wave. the new trends the new era of fashion. Let the pieces speak for itself when you wear anything from this collection.
